participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Determined and active, Alex seeks challenge and enjoys pushing personal limits. She can be a bit cynical at times, especially when faced with difficult situations.
participant_1.background: Two dogs live with me. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Eating is something I do when I'm bored. I have short hair. I go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reflective and introspective, Jordan often contemplates his past and the challenges he has faced. He carries a sense of vulnerability but also determination to improve himself.
participant_2.background: I now live in the city. I'm a recovering alcoholic. I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I grew up on a farm.

content.text: Hi. Are you another not real thing I frequently see?
Iâ€™m not strong enough for this... Do you have any alcohol?
